event.title: was destroyed during the Saxon rebellion of 1068

data.event: It seems likely that Denton was destroyed during the Saxon rebellion of 1068.

event.title: does not appear in the Doomsday book of 1086

data.event: It does not appear in the Doomsday book of 1086.
Denton's church, St. Leonard's, was first built around 1288, later extended and carefully restored during the Decorated Period.
